page.body_html:
Welcome to Your Crafter CMS Site.

This site blueprint is the equivalent of a Hello World. It's a blank slate on which you can build your own digital experience.

  • To create new content types use the Site Tools > Content Types menu on the left Sidebar
  • To update markup, edit this template by clicking the item menu on the top toolbar and select "Edit Template"
  • To modify the this text, hover/click on it or use the item menu and select "Edit" on the top toolbar
  • Crafter documentation can be found here
  • Crafter CMS authoring and developer training is available. Please contact info@craftersoftware.com

This content is managed by the form.  Click edit to change OR in the upper right hand corner, click the pencil to turn on in-context editing.
